Text:
...Now to report on the individual activities of
the Seven Shadows over the last week.

Gamma is moving to acquire shares of a company in
the Midgar Kingdom.
Do we have any intel on this company?

It's an old company called Luna, Ltd. that deals in
clothing supplies. They're currently inactive due
to the age of their president—she's quite senile.

According to Gamma's report, the transfer of company
management will be done quietly and smoothly.

It's imperative not to rock the boat when gaining a
foothold. I'm impressed with Gamma's results
already.
Zeta continues to carry out her espionage activities.

It seems she's also exploring and vetting new
locations for our base. She's sent a list of
potential sites, but—

I've gone through the list, along with Zeta's notes.
It seems she's not satisfied with any of the sites.
We'll have her continue the search.
Delta and Eta are on standby.
Eta is immersed in her research. As for Delta—
I'm bored! I wanna go hunting! Waaaah!
Oh my! We're really testing her patience...

Wouldn't it be better if she learned to do other
jobs?

He—Shadow, that is—already tried that. But one day,
he seemed to realize something and gave up.

The distant look in his eyes told me it would be best
to focus on developing her strengths than forcing
her to overcome her weaknesses.
I see...

Epsilon is surveying the underground facility Zeta
investigated last week, believed to belong to the
Cult of Diablos.

She should be back soon from completing
the investigation and survey.
Speaking of Epsilon, here she is.
Lady Alpha, I've returned.
Welcome back, Epsilon.
...Welcome back.
...Thanks.
...Can we continue our conversation?
Huh? Pl-Please!
Ack, yes!
Well, Epsilon, how was it?

Right. Our intel was unverified, but I've been able
to confirm that the underground facility is indeed
a hideout for the Cult of Diablos.

Furthermore, there are traces that the possessed were
transported there within the last couple of days!
Looks like we'll need to hurry.
Should we make a move now?

Yes. Beta, Epsilon, prepare to launch an attack. I'll
inform Delta. We leave in 30 minutes, understood?
Got it!
Understood!
